eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
S_D & = \int d^3x & {\Big \{ } \frac{1}{2}B_\mu B^\mu +
\frac{1}{2m}\epsilon_{\mu \nu \rho }\left[ B^\mu \partial^\nu B^\rho
+b^\mu(\theta ,B) \partial^\nu b^\rho(\theta ,B) \right] \nonumber \\
& & -\frac{1}{4}{\cal L} \left(\theta ,\frac{H}{m}+\frac{h(\theta ,B)}{m}\right) { \Big\} }.
\label{dac}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
b_\theta^0 & = & \frac{\theta}{m^2}\left[ H_{\mu \nu}H^{\mu \nu} +
2H_{12}H_{12}\right] , \nonumber \\
b_\theta^1 &  = & \frac{2\theta }{m^2} H_{12}H_{02}, \label{bt} \\
b_\theta^2 & = & \frac{2\theta }{m^2} H_{12}H_{10}. \nonumber
\
